images.title: Dreams and Nightmares (1)
images.description: An abstract rendition of nightmares. The animation was projected onto the balloons, representing dream bubbles. As the night went on, the balloons slowly fell off the wall, as if the memory of each dream was fading.

images.title: The Fabric of the Cosmos (1)
images.description: A visual representation of the layers of strings that make up our cosmos. If viewed from the front, the piece looked dense and complex, but walking alongside of it the viewer can see each individual loop connected to the other loops.
images.materials: Knitting needles, cable ties, fishing line
